description: Profile selection using TOPSIS algorithm with configurable skill threshold
author: Abdel YEZZA (Ph.D)

proximity_formula_description.standard: S*[i] = E-[i] / (E+[i] + E-[i]) - Values between 0 and 1
proximity_formula_description.variant: S*[i] = E-[i] / E+[i] - Better discrimination, normalized to [0,1]

threshold_settings.description: Skill levels >= threshold are treated as beneficial (maximize), < threshold as non-beneficial (minimize)

strategy_descriptions.requirement_based: Weights proportional to required skill levels
